channel.title: Perm ban
channel.description: ok like 7 months ago my main got perm ban for macroing, because my friend was botting 99 hunter and for ags, and he left the bot on for a week nonstop because he couldn't get to his computer, but 4 months ago i read the thread to unban my account, and i haven't gotten a email from jagex yet :(

item.title: Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @_Rich Rich
item.description:
@_Rich wrote:

You realize only certain accounts are eligible for reinstatement, right? I’m sure by being banned for botting you won’t be given that opportunity.

Plus, as mentioned before, Jagex has to approach you, and if they haven’t already then it won’t be happening.

OP, it takes them awhile to review accounts since thousands of accounts get posted in that thread, just be patient. Though, I’m not sure if they actually contact you if they’ve decided to not unban your account…

Read full topic

item.title: Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @Tobbescape Tobbescape
item.description:
@Tobbescape wrote:

[quote=“imsuperman05, post:5, topic:399514”][quote author=Andrew Ferguson link=topic=496643.msg3631143#msg3631143 date=1308237470]
Ahh Jagex, putting people who cheat back in the game for money since 2011. [size=2pt]Fags.[/size]
[/quote]
Nah, you can’t pay to unban, but it wasn’t my idea to bot :([size=2pt]lmfao stfu[/size][/quote]
You can pay now ROFL.

Banned Account Reinstatement

If Jagex bans any account as a result of your breach of the Rules of RuneScape and you have exhausted the Offence Appeals Process, Jagex may, in its absolute discretion, give you an opportunity to make a fixed payment to reinstate the account.

Any membership credit that is associated with an account cannot be used to pay for such reinstatement. Please note that throughout the period during which the account was banned, any membership credit will continue to expire.

Jagex is not obliged to reinstate any accounts. You are not obliged to exercise the option to reinstate your account. If you are offered the opportunity, it is entirely up to you whether you make any such payment to reinstate an account.

Any gains or advantages that Jagex considers were made as a result of using macros shall be removed from your account. You accept that the account will be returned to you, adjusted by Jagex to take account of the cheating offence, and no discussion will be entered into regarding the status of a returned account.

lool

Read full topic

item.title: Perm ban
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Tobbescape:

what about paying for it to get unbanned? Lol

I guess Jagex sends you an Email about paying for your account to be unbanned…

imsuperman05:

ok like 7 months ago my main got perm ban for macroing, because my friend was botting 99 hunter and for ags, and he left the bot on for a week nonstop because he couldn’t get to his computer, but 4 months ago i read the thread to unban my account, and i haven’t gotten a email from jagex yet

They choose who gets the Email… They don’t just send it to all banned accounts…

Read full topic
